content.text: What do you normally do when looking for entertainment? While some people select a new hobby carefully, others just let a new hobby find them. Either way, when people want to be entertained and they are open to new ideas, they learn something, and therefore, they get knowledge.

content.text: For example, did you know that listening to or making music has been proven to have positive effects on our bodies? Doing one or the other increases blood flow to brain regions that generate and control emotions. So, practically, music improves our processes related to emotions.
